DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn if BMS-582664 can shrink or slow the growth of advanced liver cancer. The safety of this treatment will also be studied.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Open Label Study of BMS-582664 in Locally Advanced or Metastatic Hepatocellular Cancer
